Description: Limestone ostracon with 16 horizontal lines of text on one side..
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (234-239, pl.30)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82894) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82894)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 28 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
